Title: Mukhtasar al-Akhdari
BookDescription: A Maliki fiqh handbook regarding acts of worship.

Title: The Ultimate Conspectus
BookDescription: A Shafi'i book of fiqh about worship and social dealings.

Title: Purification of the Heart
BookDescription: A book regarding spiritual diseases of the heart.
Author: Imam al-Mawlud
